meanings.sent1: My doctor told me to watch my diet to help with my hypertensions.

meanings.sent3: Even the cartoon character had to deal with hypertensions after eating too much junk food.
meanings.sent4: The city's infrastructure was under so much stress, it felt like the hypertensions of a ticking time bomb.

meanings.sent1: The hypertensions of the storm caused trees to fall and power lines to snap.
